introText: The Prhyme Minister (PM) is a pioneering rapper who helped establish Pidgin rap as a distinct style in the UK music scene, blending African rhythms with classic hip-hop storytelling.
body:
PM rose to prominence as one of the pioneers of Pidgin rap, a style that later gained widespread popularity across African and diaspora music scenes. Known for his witty lyricism and cultural storytelling, PM's music bridges the gap between UK urban culture and African musical traditions.

His distinctive flow and clever wordplay have made him a respected voice in the UK rap landscape. PM is currently working on his solo album, featuring the singles "Yee-Titi-Yee" and "Make Your Mind Dey," which showcase his unique blend of humour, social commentary, and infectious beats.

As an artist, PM uses his platform to tell stories that resonate with both African diaspora communities and wider UK audiences, creating music that's both culturally authentic and universally relatable.

timeline.event: Released singles "Yee-Titi-Yee" and "Make Your Mind Dey"
Pioneer of Pidgin rap style in the UK

pressQuotes.quote: The PM is bringing a fresh energy to the UK underground scene.
One of the most exciting new talents in UK rap and electronic music.

bookingText: Available for features, collaborations, and live performances
